title: Coffee Shop Customer Service Flow
uml:
@startuml
left to right direction
actor "Customer" as customer
actor "Cashier" as cashier
usecase "Place Order" as UC1
usecase "Process Payment" as UC2
usecase "Make Coffee" as UC3
usecase "Serve Coffee" as UC4
customer --> UC1
customer --> UC2
cashier --> UC3
cashier --> UC4
UC1 ..> UC2 : includes
UC2 ..> UC3 : includes
UC3 ..> UC4 : includes
@enduml
